title: Statement on the visit of National Security Advisor General James Jones to Afghanistan | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 16, 2010

 



Statement on the visit of National Security Advisor General James Jones to Afghanistan




Statement by Deputy NSC Spokesman Benjamin Chang on the visit of National Security Advisor General James Jones to Afghanistan
General Jones visited Kabul on July 16 to meet with Ambassador Eikenberry, General Petraeus, and Afghan and international officials.  He had just concluded a visit to New Delhi for meetings with Indian officials and took advantage of being in the region to make the brief stop.  He discussed the current security situation, regional stability, and the upcoming Kabul Conference.
